SELECT MARKET_NO AS marketNo ,USER_NICK AS userNick ,MARKET_TITLE AS marketTitle ,MARKET_TEXT AS marketText ,MARKET_ISDELETED AS marketIsDeleted ,MARKET_CREATE_AT AS marketCreateAt ,MARKET_CREATE_NAME AS marketCreateNm ,MARKET_PRICE AS marketPrice FROM ROYAL.TB_MARKET WHERE 1=1
AND MARKET_NO = ${marketNo}
SELECT '/fpics/'||A.IMG_UUID||A.IMG_EXTENSION AS marketImgPath FROM ROYAL.IMG_MASTER A WHERE A.IMG_NO = (SELECT B.IMG_NO FROM ROYAL.TB_MAKET_MAPPING B WHERE B.MARKET_NO = ${marketNo})

SELECT IMG_NO as marketImgNo , IMG_PATH as marketImgPath , IMG_NAME as marketImgNm , IMG_UUID as marketImgU , IMG_EXTENSION as marketImgEx , IMG_SIZE as marketImgSize , IMG_CREATE_AT as marketImgCreateAt , IMG_CREATE_NAME as marketImgCreateNm FROM ROYAL.IMG_MASTER WHERE IMG_NAME =#{marketImgNm}

SELECT M_REPLY_NO as mrNo , USER_NICK as userNick , M_REPLY_TEXT as mrText , MARKET_NO as marketNo , M_REPLY_ISDELETED as mrIsDeleted , M_REPLY_CREATE_NAME as mrCreateNm , M_REPLY_CREATE_AT as mrCreateAt , M_REPLY_MODIFY_AT as mrNodifyAt , M_REPLY_MODIFY_NAME as mrModifyNm FROM ROYAL.TB_M_REPLY WHERE 1=1
AND MARKET_NO = ${marketNo}
